TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/StateConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts objects from one data type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You should never create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter> class. Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class. For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
